titleStmt.title: Free ports the nature and necessitie of them stated.
titleStmt.author: Worsley, Benjamin.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Du-Gard, Printer to the Council of State; and are to bee sold by Nicholas Bourn in Cornhil, at the corner shop, at the entrance into the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: B.W. [i.e. Benjamin Worlsey].

Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (Early English books), the University of London (Goldsmiths'-Kress library of economic literature) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).

place.placeName: Cornhil, at the corner shop, at the entrance into the Exchange
